UpdateSetSingle
UPDATE
  EMPLOYEES E
SET
  BONUS_POINTS =
  (
    SELECT
      SUM(R.AMOUNT)
    FROM
      REWARDS R
    WHERE
      R.EMP_ID = E.EMP_ID
      AND
      R.GRANTED_AT >= :targetMonth
  )
WHERE
  E.EMP_ID = :empId

UpdateSetMultiple
UPDATE
  ACCOUNT_SUMMARY A
SET
  CURRENT_BALANCE =
  (
    SELECT
      SUM(T.AMOUNT)
    FROM
      ACCOUNT_TRANSACTIONS T
    WHERE
      T.ACCOUNT_ID = A.ACCOUNT_ID
      AND
      T.TRANS_DATE >= :fromDate
      AND
      T.TRANS_DATE < :toDate
  ),
  LAST_PAYMENT_DATE =
  (
    SELECT
      MAX(P.PAYMENT_DATE)
    FROM
      PAYMENTS P
    WHERE
      P.ACCOUNT_ID = A.ACCOUNT_ID
  )
WHERE
  A.ACCOUNT_ID = :accountId
